Package es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.views

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoardJPanel.PieceAppearanceMap
    An interface which dictates how should each piece be painted, determining both its color and its shape.
    GameWindow.GameModeListener  
    GameWindow.MoveGenerationChangesListener  
    GameWindow.QuitRestartListener  
    PieceJPanel.PieceSelectionListener
    The listener for clicks on pieces.
    ServerWindow.ServerChangesListener
    Interface which listens to the changes of the server.
    SettingsPanel.SettingsListener
    The listener for all the events generated in this panel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardJPanel
    A panel which manages a board.
    ColorPanel
    A panel which features a color chooser and a confirm button.
    CustomJTable
    A JTable subclass to make painting rows easier.
    CustomRenderer
    A custom renderer to make changing the table appearance easier.
    FiniteRectBoardJPanel
    Manages and displays a finite rectangular board in the screen.
    GameWindow
    The frame which manages the whole game UI.
    PieceJPanel
    A panel which paints a piece.
    ServerWindow
    A graphical console for the server based on the example uploaded to Campus Virtual.
    SettingsPanel
    The settingsPanel contains all the settings for a game.
    SwingView
    This controller manages a game which is played with a GUI.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SwingView.PlayerMode
    An enum which describes the three possible player modes: manual, random and AI.
